description: This Java class 'AuthController' defines REST API endpoints for user authentication, including registration and login, within a Spring Boot application. It interacts with an authentication service and uses Swagger annotations for API documentation.

classes.name: AuthController
classes.description: Controller class managing authentication endpoints for registration and login, annotated as a REST controller with Swagger tags.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Handles user registration by accepting a registration request, delegating to AuthService, and returning a response with user info.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Handles user login validation, returning a success response with user info or an unauthorized status if credentials are invalid.
